00066 #include <stdio.h>
00067 #include <stdlib.h>
00068 #include <string.h>
00069 #include "mscb.h"
00070 
00071 char code node_name[] = "SCS-310";
00072 
00073 /* declare number of sub-addresses to framework */
00074 unsigned char idata _n_sub_addr = 1;
00075 
00076 bit terminal_mode, term_flag, output_flag, control_flag;
00077 xdata char term_buf[80];
00078 char tbwp, tbrp;
00079 
00080 /*---- Define variable parameters returned to the CMD_GET_INFO command ----*/
00081 
00082 /* data buffer (mirrored in EEPROM) */
00083 
00084 struct {
00085    char output[32];
00086    char input[32];
00087    char control;
00088    char srq;
00089    char gpib_adr;
00090 } idata user_data;
00091 
00092 MSCB_INFO_VAR code variables[] = {
00093    1,  UNIT_ASCII,  0, 0, MSCBF_DATALESS, "GPIB",                       0, // 0
00094    32, UNIT_STRING, 0, 0,              0, "Output",  &user_data.output[0], // 1
00095    32, UNIT_STRING, 0, 0,              0, "Input",    &user_data.input[0], // 2
00096    1,  UNIT_BYTE,   0, 0,              0, "Control",   &user_data.control, // 3
00097    1,  UNIT_BYTE,   0, 0,              0, "SRQ",           &user_data.srq, // 4
00098    1,  UNIT_BYTE,   0, 0,              0, "GPIB Adr", &user_data.gpib_adr, // 5
00099    0
00100 };

00102 /********************************************************************\
00103 
00104   Application specific init and inout/output routines
00105 
00106 \********************************************************************/
00107 
00108 /* 8 data bits to LPT */
00109 #define GPIB_DATA        P1
00110 
00111 /* GPIB control/status bits DB40 */
00112 sbit GPIB_EOI  = P2 ^ 1;         // Pin 5
00113 sbit GPIB_DAV  = P2 ^ 2;         // Pin 6
00114 sbit GPIB_NRFD = P2 ^ 3;         // Pin 7
00115 sbit GPIB_NDAC = P2 ^ 4;         // Pin 8
00116 sbit GPIB_IFC  = P2 ^ 5;         // Pin 9
00117 sbit GPIB_SRQ  = P2 ^ 6;         // Pin 10
00118 sbit GPIB_ATN  = P2 ^ 7;         // Pin 11
00119 sbit GPIB_REM  = P2 ^ 0;         // Pin 17
00120 
00121 #pragma NOAREGS
00122 
00123 void user_write(unsigned char index) reentrant;
00124 char send(unsigned char adr, char *str);
00125 char send_byte(unsigned char b);
00126 
00127 /*---- User init function ------------------------------------------*/
00128 
00129 void user_init(unsigned char init)
00130 {
00131    /* set initial state of lines */
00132    GPIB_DATA = 0xFF;
00133    GPIB_EOI = 1;
00134    GPIB_DAV = 1;
00135    GPIB_NRFD = 1;
00136    GPIB_NDAC = 1;
00137    GPIB_IFC = 1;
00138    GPIB_SRQ = 1;
00139    GPIB_ATN = 1;
00140    GPIB_REM = 1;
00141 
00142    /* initialize GPIB */
00143    GPIB_IFC = 0;
00144    delay_ms(1);
00145    GPIB_IFC = 1;
00146 
00147    GPIB_ATN = 0;
00148    send_byte(0x14);             // DCL
00149    GPIB_ATN = 1;
00150 
00151    terminal_mode = 0;
00152    output_flag = 0;
00153 
00154    if (init) {
00155       user_data.gpib_adr = 16;
00156       user_data.control = 0;
00157       user_data.srq = 0;
00158    }
00159 }
00160 
00161 /*---- User write function -----------------------------------------*/
00162 
00163 /* buffers in mscbmain.c */
00164 extern unsigned char xdata in_buf[300], out_buf[300];
00165 
00166 void user_write(unsigned char index) reentrant
00167 {
00168    if (index == 0) {
00169       if (in_buf[2] == 27)
00170          terminal_mode = 0;
00171       else if (in_buf[2] == 0) {
00172          terminal_mode = 1;
00173          term_flag = 0;
00174          tbwp = 0;
00175          tbrp = 0;
00176       } else {
00177          /* put byte in terminal buffer for main loop */
00178          term_buf[tbwp] = in_buf[2];
00179          if (tbwp < sizeof(term_buf))
00180             tbwp++;
00181       }
00182    }
00183 
00184    if (index == 1)
00185       output_flag = 1;
00186 
00187    if (index == 3)
00188       control_flag = 1;
00189 }
00190 
00191 /*---- User read function ------------------------------------------*/
00192 
00193 unsigned char user_read(unsigned char index)
00194 {
00195    if (index == 0) {
00196       if (terminal_mode && term_flag == 1) {
00197          out_buf[1] = term_buf[tbrp++];
00198          if (tbrp == tbwp) {
00199             tbrp = tbwp = 0;
00200             term_flag = 0;
00201          }
00202          return 1;
00203       }
00204    }
00205 
00206    return 0;
00207 }
00208 
00209 /*---- User function called vid CMD_USER command -------------------*/
00210 
00211 unsigned char user_func(unsigned char *data_in, unsigned char *data_out)
00212 {
00213    /* echo input data */
00214    data_out[0] = data_in[0];
00215    data_out[1] = data_in[1];
00216    return 2;
00217 }
00218 
00219 /*---- Functions for GPIB port -------------------------------------*/
00220 
00221 char send_byte(unsigned char b)
00222 {
00223    unsigned int i;
00224 
00225    yield();
00226 
00227    /* wait for NRFD go high */
00228    for (i = 0; i < 1000; i++)
00229       if (GPIB_NRFD == 1)
00230          break;
00231 
00232    if (GPIB_NRFD == 0)
00233       return 0;
00234 
00235    GPIB_DATA = ~b;              // negate
00236    delay_us(1);                 // let signals settle
00237    GPIB_DAV = 0;
00238 
00239    /* wait for NDAC go high */
00240    for (i = 0; i < 1000; i++)
00241       if (GPIB_NDAC == 1)
00242          break;
00243 
00244    if (GPIB_NDAC == 0) {
00245       GPIB_DAV = 1;
00246       GPIB_DATA = 0xFF;
00247       return 0;                 // timeout
00248    }
00249 
00250    GPIB_DAV = 1;
00251    GPIB_DATA = 0xFF;            // prepare for input
00252 
00253    /* wait for NRFD go high */
00254    for (i = 0; i < 1000; i++)
00255       if (GPIB_NRFD == 1)
00256          break;
00257 
00258    if (GPIB_NRFD == 0)
00259       return 0;
00260 
00261    return 1;
00262 }
00263 
00264 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00265 
00266 char send(unsigned char adr, char *str)
00267 {
00268    unsigned char i;
00269 
00270   /*---- address cycle ----*/
00271 
00272    GPIB_ATN = 0;                // assert attention
00273    send_byte(0x3F);             // unlisten
00274    send_byte(0x5F);             // untalk
00275    send_byte(0x20 | adr);       // listen device
00276    send_byte(0x40 | 21);        // talk 21
00277    GPIB_ATN = 1;                // remove attention
00278 
00279   /*---- data cycles ----*/
00280 
00281    for (i = 0; str[i] > 0; i++)
00282       if (send_byte(str[i]) == 0)
00283          return 0;
00284 
00285    GPIB_EOI = 0;
00286    send_byte(0x0A);             // NL
00287    GPIB_EOI = 1;
00288 
00289    return i;
00290 }
00291 
00292 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00293 
00294 char enter(unsigned char adr, char *str, char maxlen)
00295 {
00296    unsigned long t;
00297    unsigned char i, flag;
00298    unsigned int j;
00299 
00300   /*---- address cycle ----*/
00301 
00302    GPIB_ATN = 0;                // assert attention
00303    send_byte(0x3F);             // unlisten
00304    send_byte(0x5F);             // untalk
00305    send_byte(0x20 | 21);        // listen 21
00306    send_byte(0x40 | adr);       // talk device
00307    GPIB_ATN = 1;                // remove attention
00308 
00309   /*---- data cycles ----*/
00310 
00311    GPIB_NDAC = 0;               // init NDAC line
00312 
00313    memset(str, 0, maxlen);
00314 
00315    for (i = 0; i < maxlen; i++) {
00316       yield();
00317 
00318       GPIB_NRFD = 1;            // singal ready for data
00319 
00320       /* wait 1s for DAV go low */
00321       t = time();
00322       do {
00323          if (GPIB_DAV == 0)
00324             break;
00325 
00326          yield();
00327 
00328       } while (time() - t < 100);
00329 
00330       if (GPIB_DAV == 1) {
00331          GPIB_NDAC = 1;
00332          GPIB_NRFD = 1;
00333          return 0;              // timeout
00334       }
00335 
00336       led_blink(1, 1, 100);     // singal data received
00337 
00338       GPIB_NRFD = 0;            // signal busy
00339 
00340       str[i] = ~GPIB_DATA;      // read negated data
00341 
00342       flag = GPIB_EOI;          // read EOI flag
00343 
00344       GPIB_NDAC = 1;            // signal acknowledge
00345 
00346       /* wait for DAV go high */
00347       for (j = 0; j < 1000; j++)
00348          if (GPIB_DAV == 1)
00349             break;
00350 
00351       GPIB_NDAC = 0;            // remove acknowledge
00352 
00353       if (flag == 0)            // stop if end of data
00354          break;
00355    }
00356 
00357    GPIB_NDAC = 1;               // release handshake lines
00358    GPIB_NRFD = 1;
00359 
00360    /* stop talker */
00361    GPIB_ATN = 0;                // assert attention
00362    send_byte(0x3F);             // unlisten
00363    send_byte(0x5F);             // untalk
00364    GPIB_ATN = 1;                // remove attention
00365 
00366    return i;
00367 }
00368 
00369 /*---- User loop function ------------------------------------------*/
00370 
00371 idata char str[32];
00372 
00373 void user_loop(void)
00374 {
00375    if (terminal_mode) {
00376       /* check terminal buffer */
00377       DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00378       if (tbwp > 0 && term_buf[tbwp - 1] == 13) {
00379          /* add trailing "0" */
00380          if (tbwp == sizeof(term_buf))
00381             tbwp--;
00382          term_buf[tbwp] = 0;
00383 
00384          /* send buffer */
00385          send(user_data.gpib_adr, term_buf);
00386 
00387          led_blink(1, 1, 100);
00388 
00389          /* receive buffer */
00390          tbwp = enter(user_data.gpib_adr, term_buf, sizeof(term_buf));
00391 
00392          if (tbwp > 0) {
00393             /* add newline */
00394             term_buf[tbwp++] = 10;
00395             term_flag = 1;
00396          } else
00397             term_flag = 0;
00398       }
00399       ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00400    }
00401 
00402    if (output_flag) {
00403       output_flag = 0;
00404 
00405       /* send buffer */
00406       send(user_data.gpib_adr, user_data.output);
00407 
00408       /* receive buffer */
00409       if (enter(user_data.gpib_adr, user_data.input, sizeof(user_data.input)))
00410          led_blink(1, 1, 100);
00411 
00412       /* stip NL */
00413       if (strlen(user_data.input) > 0 &&
00414           user_data.input[strlen(user_data.input) - 1] == 10)
00415          user_data.input[strlen(user_data.input) - 1] = 0;
00416    }
00417 
00418    if (control_flag) {
00419       control_flag = 0;
00420 
00421       GPIB_ATN = 0;             // assert attention
00422       send_byte(0x3F);          // unlisten
00423       send_byte(0x5F);          // untalk
00424       send_byte(0x20 | user_data.gpib_adr);     // listen device
00425       send_byte(0x40 | 21);     // talk 21
00426       send_byte(user_data.control);     // send control
00427       send_byte(0x3F);          // unlisten
00428       send_byte(0x5F);          // untalk
00429       GPIB_ATN = 1;             // remove attention
00430    }
00431 }
